Description:
Required Skills to be SuccessfulTeamworkCommunication Fast Learning About the TeamThe Retail team is a group of highly motivated, collaborative, and fun professionals across Egypt, looking for a member to add to the department.What equips you for the roleBachelor's degree in Business administration, or any related field.
Successful track record of building effective tenant relations within a shopping mall or retail property management environment. 
Minimum 4 years of relevant experience in a similar position.
Knowledge of tenancy-related issues in shopping malls. 
Knowledge of retail leasing and lease management.
Strong knowledge and exposure to the retail market.*Nationals*Job Details
